en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Miss Pahang Tourism Queen 2009!
en.content:
REPORT SUBMITTED BY FUSIONEXCEL EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR GARY GAN.

The first press conference and a special seminar for the Miss Pahang Tourism Queen 2009 were held on the 03rd May 2009 at the M.S. Garden Hotel in Kuantan, Pahang. 

FusionExcel is one of the co-sponsors of the event and we were invited to give a presentation on our fantastic Quantum Pendant and other FusionExcel products to the beauty pageants and other guests. Both the beauty pageants & the guests were excited about the products, which were demonstrated by FusionExcel Spokesman & Bodybuilding Champion Mr. Wong Hong and Executive Director Gary Gan.

The event drew a lot of good responses as many of the pageants and guests were very interested on the fantastic business opportunity that FusionExcel has to offer. 

The finals of the Miss Pahang Tourism Queen 2009 will be held on the 24th May 2009 in M.S. Garden Hotel where the winner of the event will be chosen. 

Attached is newspaper article that appeared in China Press following by the press conference.
